articles.title: Jaishankar, Blinken discuss maritime security amid ‘reckless’ Houthi attacks - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Houthi action in the Red Sea prompted many commercial shippers to direct their vessels around the southern tip of Africa. | Latest News India
articles.content: External affairs minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar and US secretary of state Antony Blinken discussed the shared concerns over the reckless Houthi attacks in the southern Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden,… [+1813 chars]

articles.title: ‘Israel is committing genocide in Gaza,’ South Africa tells the UN top court - Hindustan Times

articles.content: In a case that strikes at the heart of Israel's national identity, South Africa formally accused the country of committing genocide against Palestinians and pleaded Thursday with the United Nations t… [+7475 chars]
